dynamic_line.yes: Hey there, lady. What brings you to our little town in Gallia?
dynamic_line.no: Hello there. What is a man like you doing in our town in Gallia?

responses.text: So you're a man in this town? What's it like living in Gallia?
Goodbye, thank you for your time.

dynamic_line.yes: I've lived here all my life and I can't think of any place I would rather be. The windmills, the factories, the rural towns and large cities, it makes me feel at home. It's a shame that the Imperials decided to invade and ruin our tranquil life.
